text:
@CNNPolitics Trump is responsible for over 126,000 + American deaths as a result of his Coronavirus inaction. Rallies expose more constituents to the virus. They don't wear masks, don't practice social distancing & are in enclosed spaces. They return to family & friends.
Stop killing us.
